body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Aaron Nelson and the customer's name is Janice James.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Aaron Nelson, and I represent Phat Hogs, your friendly neighborhood motorcycle dealership. What's your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Janice! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed with all the choices for motorcycles.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Janice. There are so many options out there. Could I ask for your age? This will help me narrow down the best options for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for sharing that. And could you also tell me your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janice! Based on your age and location, I can recommend some fantastic models. Do you have a preference for style or type of motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’m looking for something sporty but also comfortable for long rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Excellent choice! We have some great options that fit your criteria. Thank you for your time, Janice, and feel free to ask me anything else you need!
